result.execSummary: Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo

records.addlTxt: Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Hans Peter Koesser in court for Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo. Defendant Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo in court, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. This case was previously refiled as a new case and closed out.

Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Hans Peter Koesser in court for Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo. Defendant Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. During the plea colloquy the DE seemed to be having some trouble. DE's mother in court and states she does not believe the DE is thinking clearly.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Hans Peter Koesser in court for Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo. Defendant Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. This case was refiled as 22CF432. This case was previously closed.

Attorney Emily Gaertner appeared for the State. Attorney Hans Peter Koesser in court for Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo. Defendant Leah T. Mendoza-Castillo appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke.  Attorney Koesser asks for a new date. Corresponding case should be transferred back to br 2 from br 6.
Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Due to a conflict in the court calendar the STC of 08/25/22 at 2:30 has been adjourned to 09/14/22 at 2:30.

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State by zoom.  Defendant in custody and appeared by zoom w/ Attorney Koesser.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Koesser's bond motion. For reasons set forth on the record the bond motion is denied.
With Attorney Koesser a MH has been set to 07/08/22 at 10:30 on the Bond Motion.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Emily Gaertner appeared for the State. Defendant in custody by zoom w/Attorney  H Koesser. Clerk/H. Barnett. Atty Koesser states he wants to look into behavioral health court for the deft. STC continued to 8/25/22 at 2:30pm. Bond continued.

Attorney Emily Gaertner appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared by zoom w/ Attorney Koesser.   Clerk. M.Burke. Atty Koesser asks for more time to see if DE can get into the Jail diversion program. STC set to 06/01/22 at 4:00.
